title: Change the World
contentText: Submit your idea as to how you will personally commit to being more inclusive with business associates, friends and family, to promote diversity and inclusion.
boldText: One by one, we CAN change the world!

title: Diversity and inclusion
contentText: Global perspective that includes thoughts, communication style, interests, languages, values and beliefs, and a variety of dimensions.

title: Employee resource groups
contentText: Groups of people who share interests, issues, and a common bond or background, and offer support for each other.
